mainText:
Promo: Get ready to feel like royalty with Bank of Entitlement - where your every whim is our command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into Bank of Entitlement, feeling like the king of the world. I approach the teller, and with a flick of my perfectly coiffed hair, I demand to speak with the manager. Why, you ask? Because my latte wasn't delivered to my office in under 5 minutes! The nerve! The manager rushes over, apologizing profusely, and offers me free coffee for life as compensation. Of course, I graciously accept, knowing that my entitlement is well-deserved. Ah, the sweet taste of victory, mixed with a hint of espresso. Life at the top truly suits me.
